document.full_text: studies have found that colonoscopies done in the afternoon are less likely to catch abnormal growths than those done in the morning. now new research shows that the gap disappears when doctors work a half-day rather than a full one.
document.title: is morning colonoscopy better?
lines_and_colors: studies have found that colonoscopies done in the afternoon are less likely to catch abnormal growths than those done in the morning. now new research shows that the gap disappears when doctors work a half-day rather than a full one.
